title: Why does TFT not give Ranked Split bonuses?
body: Pretty much title, just wondering why TFT doesn't give any ranked split points towards the icon armor and emote. I play Ranked TFT a lot more than SoloQ so not getting the split rewards is kind of annoying. Was there any specific reason as to why Ranked TFT doesn't give the bonuses or is it something that has been planned but is yet to be implemented?
